settings.enableAutocompleteHint: Display an autocomplete menu while entering commands in the chat. Changing this setting will reload the window.
settings.maxEntriesHint: Limits how many entries can be displayed in the autocomplete menu. Additional entries will be replaced with an overflow message.
settings.autocompleteCoreHint: Include FoundryVTT core commands for autocompletion. Changing this setting will reload the window.
settings.displayFooterHint: Display aliases and the source module when autocompleting commands.

_chatcommands.extraEntries: Enter parameters to find additional results.
_chatcommands.noEntries: No registered command matches your input.
_chatcommands.insufficientPermissions: You do not have the permissions to use the {command} command.

coreCommands.ic: Send a message as the currently selected or associated character.
coreCommands.ooc: Send a message out of character.
coreCommands.emote: Perform an emote as the currently selected or associated character.

whisper.description: Send a private message to another player.

roll.gm: Roll some dice that are only visible for you and the game master.
roll.blind: Roll some dice that are only visible for the game master.
roll.self: Roll some dice that are only visible for you.
roll.public: Roll some dice that are visible for everyone.
roll.simpleInfo: Basic syntax: AmountdFaces+,-,*,/More rolls or numbers
roll.descriptionInfo: Labeled rolls: Roll[Dice description] # Roll description
